question: It started a few months ago that my son complained that it was hurting him and started to shake when he went to the bathroom it was right after he came off of antibiotics from a cold.  The doctor checked for diabetes and his level was fine.  He had several rashes from his urine it actually burned his skin when it touched him.  We went to a urologist and they did an ultrasound and it was normal, they put him on a liquid for bladder spasms.  After weeks now, he is still having the problem but not continuously.  He grabs himself and he is afraid to go to the bathroom at times since he does hurt him he shakes and trembles at times when going and is sometime not able to hold it. Any ideas would be appreciated.
title: Potty trained 3/4 year old with urinary pain
